actionable_tasks.title: Persist Rolling Window Metrics to Redis
actionable_tasks.description: Implement persistence of API latency and error metrics using Redis to enable durability and aggregation across multiple instances. This will improve observability and reliability of performance monitoring.
implementation_steps: Add Redis client initialization in src/config/redis.js if not present.
Update metrics middleware to write rolling window data to Redis on each request.
Modify scripts/bench/api-latency.js to read/write metrics from Redis for aggregation.
Test multi-instance aggregation by simulating concurrent writes and reads.
Document Redis usage and configuration in PROJECT_CONFIG.md.

actionable_tasks.title: TypeScript Migration Plan for High-Change Backend Modules
actionable_tasks.description: Draft and begin implementing a migration plan to convert backend modules with high change rates (e.g., src/api/routes/*, src/chat/*) from JavaScript to TypeScript for improved type safety and maintainability.
implementation_steps: Create tsconfig.json with appropriate settings for incremental migration.
Rename one or two high-change files (e.g., src/api/routes/example.js to example.ts) and add type annotations.
Fix type errors and update imports as needed.
Document migration steps and guidelines in a new MIGRATION.md file.

actionable_tasks.title: Add MongoDB TTL Indexes for Telemetry Data Rotation
actionable_tasks.description: Implement TTL (Time-To-Live) indexes on MongoDB telemetry collections to automatically expire old performance and health data, reducing storage usage and keeping analytics queries fast.
implementation_steps: Identify telemetry collections storing time-series data.
Add code to create TTL indexes on timestamp fields (e.g., expire after 7 days).
Test index creation and data expiration locally.
Document TTL index configuration in PROJECT_CONFIG.md.

actionable_tasks.title: EnhancedChatInterface: Provider Quick-Switch and Badge
actionable_tasks.description: Add a provider quick-switch dropdown and current provider badge to the chat interface using the useLLM() hook, improving user experience for AI provider selection.
implementation_steps: Import and use useLLM() to access provider switching logic.
Add a dropdown or button group for provider selection.
Display the current provider as a badge or chip in the UI.
Test switching and badge updates in the chat interface.

actionable_tasks.title: EnhancedMusicDiscovery: Mood Sliders and Feature Visualization
actionable_tasks.description: Implement client-only mood sliders and a mini radar/sparkline visualization for moodSettings in the music discovery UI, enabling users to interactively explore music recommendations.
implementation_steps: Add slider components for moodSettings (e.g., energy, valence).
Implement a radar or sparkline chart to visualize current slider values.
Wire up slider changes to update the visualization in real time.
Test UI responsiveness and usability.
